fields.text: Welcome to OpenTable in San Francisco, where you can find your table for any occasion.
To make a new reservation, press '[INDEX]'.
To reserve a table for today, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our same-day reservations team.
To reserve a table for another date, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our advanced booking specialists.
For customer support and inquiries, press '[INDEX]'.
For help with an existing reservation, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to customer support for reservation assistance.
If you’re a restaurant looking to partner with us, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our restaurant partnerships department.
